SELECT uam.user_award_id, uam.create_time, uam.used_status, uam.point, buyer.user_id, buyer.name, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, a.award_id, a.award_name, operator.user_id AS operator_id, operator.name AS operator_name FROM tb_user_award_map uam, tb_person_info buyer, tb_shop s, tb_award a, tb_person_info operator
uam.user_id = buyer.user_id and uam.shop_id = s.shop_id and uam.award_id = a.award_id and uam.operator_id = operator.user_id
and a.award_name like '%${userAwardCondition.award.awardName}%'
ORDER BY uam.create_time desc LIMIT #{rowIndex},#{pageSize};

SELECT uam.user_award_id, uam.create_time, uam.used_status, uam.point, buyer.user_id, buyer.name, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, a.award_id, a.award_name, uam.operator_id AS operator_id FROM tb_user_award_map uam, tb_person_info buyer, tb_shop s, tb_award a WHERE uam.user_id = buyer.user_id and uam.shop_id = s.shop_id and uam.award_id = a.award_id and user_award_id = #{userAwardId}
